page.title: 04RELIGION
page.content: {Church Attendance Survey. We decided to find out how many people went to church every week.Out of 82 children in the junior classes,21 go to church or Sunday school once a week.Four go with one or more of their parents.No one went twice a week.Which churches do they attend? St.Peters Anglican Church-9,Methodist church-2,Baptist-2,Church of the Nazerene-6,and Wesleyan-2. 17 people walked and took less than 10 minutes,3 said it was more than 2 but less than 5 miles.15 people walked ,5 went by car and 1 walked. When asked what they liked and disliked,3 people enjoyed praying,1 singing,1 stories,2 helping and 14 liked making things. Of dislikes,10 didn't like praying,8 singing,2 stories,1 helping.Nobody disliked making and doing things.
